response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and the significant impact it could have on your operations, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11,500. This represents a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your company's performance. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 11500}
